reviewText:
This is cute fluffy stuff to watch if you've just marathoned something really depressing and heavy. It's nice to see how the characters have matured since their first appearance in the show, too. Sadly, this is probably the last time you'll hear Yoshinoya-sensei, as the voice actress passed away recently.

This dvd does NOT contain the graduation episode for Hiro and Sae. They are merely preparing to graduate (so there's Senior Class Trips and stuff that features them).
